archiveModal.title: Archive service

addService.title: Add a New Service

addService.description: A service is a succulent set of tasks or instances in which information can be gathered with a kiosk form questionnaire.

addService._customFormFields.comment: Label for the section of the form for adding custom form fields
addService._addClientIntakeForm.comment: Button text for adding a client intake form
addService.clientContentWarning: Client Intake Form Includes: Client name, contact information, preferences and demographics (gender, ethnicity, race, preferred language, preferred contact method, preferred contact time)
addService._clientContentWarning.comment: Warning on the add service form to indicate which fields exist on the client intake form in order to prevent the specialist from adding duplicate fields to the custom field inputs for the service
